text: Selaginella substipitata, the stalked spikemoss, is a species of plant in the Selaginellaceae family, endemic to Caribbean islands, Colombia, and Venezuela. ==Synonyms== * Selaginella karsteniana A. Braun * Selaginella rigidula Baker ==References== * Bull. Acad. Roy. Sci. Bruxelles 10(1): 227 1843. * The Plant List * GBIF * substipitata
title: Selaginella substipitata
